my amazing space marines

I use this link to make space marines quiet down a little ; ) [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/4491-Put-a-Face-to-the-name/page41#409](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/4491-Put-a-Face-to-the-name/page41#409)

who's hill ?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-20T10:09:10Z" title="05/20/2015 10:09  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 20, 2015</time> by WinkAllKerb''**

My hill.

My hill.

your hill now, it's fine i have already done that a not so long (many (manley)) times ago in a not so far Kerbin

![KerbinWorldFirstRecordKeepingSociety.png](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/8/87/KerbinWorldFirstRecordKeepingSociety.png)

This Squad flag on everyone hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-20T10:34:03Z" title="05/20/2015 10:34  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 20, 2015</time> by WinkAllKerb''**
I conjure the powers of the creator of kerbal history and wipe out the known universe. NOBODY's HILL.

I create a new universe from scratch and make a hill in it.

My hill.

I use an AA gun borrowed from kim jeong un to execute you on your hill and blowing you to bits. I then claim the hill as mine by setting it as the eternal unbreakable law of the universe, and also make myself immortal (also eternally unbreakable law of the universe). MY HILL FOREVER.
I break your laws. My jail time.
I break you out and throw you out off the hill, my hill

I CALL UPON GREEN IRON CROWN!

my hill.

I report this post to a Mod.

My mod-supported post.

I tell jeb, stranded on the moon, to claim it as my hill.

my hill on the moon.
I mine it for resources. My resources.

I establish trade routes with you. You get a readily and regular supply of antimatter, while I receive an equivalent value of geoborne resources.

Our resources.
I use your resources to make a hill, then build a castle known as "King's Landing" on it. I claim the hill.

I crash Jeb's Eve and back mission into your castle.

My smoking castle, crater, and debris field.

I use this to conquer your hill. P.S. MY HILL.

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/LFaUaCrbFLM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

ANY GUNDAM FANS HERE?

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/xgZEXzHJwno?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
  
my superior weapon.

My school's filter blocks your youtube videos!

My hill.
I use tor to get videos through. MY HILL

badS = false

You are not worthy. The hill is now floating.

> 
> I use tor to get videos through. MY HILL

I use white-listing to block TOR, my Draconian Networking Policies D:<

I make a new hill and dub it Pruit-Igoe. It has

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/nq_SpRBXRmE?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 playing 24/7.
My hill and Xannari's floating hill.

I cast [Annex](http://gatherer.wizards.com/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=84564) on Fel's hill.

I guess you know what that means...

> 
> I cast [Annex](http://gatherer.wizards.com/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=84564) on Fel's hill.
> I guess you know what that means...

That's okay, I cast gate and bring forth Klurichir to destroy my old hill

My Chaotic Evil Demon
